resources:
Study Buddy Weclome! Command or \'help\' â€¦ Click to toggle microphone Click to toggle speaker Help About Corpora Undo Save Delete Import File Syntax Get Started Try asking Study Buddy something, like: Or: Sleek UI A beautifully crafted and intuitive chat-based UI, where you can choose to communicate through your voice or your keyboard, and hear or read the ouput. Ask me about My answer is... What about ... Your answer is wrong, wish to try again? Yes or no? Extensible Expand your Study Buddy\'s knowledge, through easy to use text-files. The format is very forgiving, each question-answer pair takes up a paragraph, and Study Buddy will help you out if it finds any errors. Is this a question?\nYes! I\'m the answer!\n\nIs this another question?\nYou bet it is! Study Buddy is a chatbot designed to help you rehearse your own study material. License Study Buddy is free software, licensed under GPLv3, you can get the source code and full terms of the license at this link: https://github.com/aiman-al-masoud/StudyBuddy. Next -> <- Back Skip Intro Done See Intro Commands Help About Corpora The file you specified doesn\'t exist! No match found for that topic! No previous command to re-run! "Here\'s the documentation I didn\'t get you." Your answer is wrong. Wish to try again? Yes or no? The correct answer is: You got close, but you missed a lot of information. Try recalling these keywords: Fair enough, but you missed these keywords: Yes, that\'s right! Flawless! You forgot the following points:\n new-file.txt Create New File Ok Cancel Click to create new file. Missing \'?\' in paragraph: Empty question in paragraph: Empty answer in paragraph: Empty corpus!
Ask me what is speed.>
Tell me a joke.
Define speed?\nSpeed is the rate of change of distance with respect to time.\n\n Joke: what do you call a chicken who crosses the road, rolls in the mud, and crosses the road again?\nA dirty double crosser.
tell me
ask me
come again
repeat
another time
one more
exit
get me out
help
yes
no
random
from
slow
slower
slowly
I don\'t know
no idea
you tell me
what time
tell time
Ask Me
Use it to trigger a question from Study Buddy.
ask me \[keywords|random\] from \[filename\]
Tell Me
Use it to ask Study Buddy to talk about a topic.
tell me \[keywords|random\] from \[filename\]
Come Again
Prompts study buddy to repeat the question.
come again | repeat \[slowly\]
Another Time
Prompts study buddy to re-run a Tell Me command with the same arguments.
another time | one more
Exit
Exits the app.
exit | get me out
Binary
Use it when Study Buddy asks a binary question.
yes|no
Help
Displays this help page.
help
Undefined
Doesn\'t do anything.
N/A
I don\'t know
If given as a reply to an answer, Study Buddy tells you the correct answer right away.
I don\'t know | No idea | You tell me
What Time
Speaks out the current time of the day.
What Time | Tell Time
